alert.note: Alert for Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Morton; Stanton; Stevens (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued December 24 at 12:53PM CST until December 26 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Dodge City
info.description: ...Near Critical Fire Weather Conditions Sunday... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT SUNDAY AFTERNOON FOR WIND AND RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 061...062...074...075... 084 AND 085... The National Weather Service in Dodge City has issued a Fire Weather Watch FOR WIND AND RELATIVE HUMIDITY, which is in effect Sunday afternoon. * Affected Area...In Kansas...Fire Weather Zone 061 Hamilton... Fire Weather Zone 062 Kearny...Fire Weather Zone 074 Stanton... Fire Weather Zone 075 Grant...Fire Weather Zone 084 Morton and Fire Weather Zone 085 Stevens. * Winds...Southwest 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 50 to 55 mph. * Timing...Sunday Afternoon * Relative Humidity...As low as 15 percent. * Temperatures...In the upper 60s to low 70s. * Impacts...Any fires that start will have extreme fire behavior and spread rapidly. Outdoor burning is not advised.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings.

area.areaDesc: Grant; Hamilton; Kearny; Morton; Stanton; Stevens
